Description: Copper alloy weight; square, with double-grooved profile; face stepped back from edge; engraved with double wreath inlaid with copper, enclosing Latin cross flanked by denominational mark; with traces of corroded silver inlay; line and two dots in each corner; file marks on sides and base.
Bibliographic references: Entwistle 2008 / A Catalogue of the Late Roman and Byzantine Weights and Weighing Equipment in the British Museum (212)
